description:
While Using with IBus, Emacs crashes occasionally.
And the integration with IBus is not that good. The configuration in ~/.emacs for ibus may not take effect between reboots.
All hail the One And True editor!

Clearly not the easiest, but the rewards for learning its intricacies are beyond compare. Other editors may be nicer or the learning curve may be softer but emacs is directly programmable by you via emacs lisp
